name: contexture-site
description: Showcase of Contexture searches adapting to diverse datasets such as: car crashes, restaurant locations, COVID-19, SAT scores, school grants, bank failures.

name: contexture-imdb
description: An example usage of Contexture to present a search interface for an ElasticSearch index of movie records based on IMDB.

name: GovSpend
description: A Contexture web-based tool that makes it easy for government agencies to find a product's best price, identify and validate vendors, request quotes and connect with peers.

name: contexture
description: The core library that exectues the DSL to retrieve data.

name: contexture-client
description: The client library that manages the DSL, allowing for hyper efficient updates running only what is exactly needed.

name: contexture-react
description: React components for building Contexture interfaces.

name: grey-vest
description: Component library built for contexture-react.

name: contexture-mongo
description: MongoDB provider for Contexture.

name: contexture-elasticsearch
description: Elasticsearch provider for Contexture.

name: contexture-exports
description: A library that extends Contexture by allowing developers to export searches into files or any other target.

name: contexture-api
description: A simple FeathersJS REST API for Contexture.

name: Contexture Docs
description: Documentation of the entire Contexture ecosystem in one place.

name: Contexture React Storybook
description: Contexture React components documentation and examples.

name: GreyVest Storybook
description: GreyVest component library's documentation and examples.

name: Contexture
description: Documentation on Contexture's core concepts, example usage, and implementation details.

name: Contexture Client
description: Documentation overview of the Contexture Client's features, api, and implementation details.

name: Contexture ElasticSearch
description: Usage and API documentation for the Contexture ElasticSearch provider library.

name: Contexture MongoDB
description: Usage and API documentation for the Contexture MongoDB provider library.

name: Contexture Exports
description: Core concepts and usage documentation for the Contexture Exports library.

name: contexture-ec18-talk
description: Elasticon 2018 talk About Contexture.

name: DataContexts talk
description: Older presentation on DataContexts, the precursor to contexture-client.

name: Contexture Talk (raw)
description: This is a raw, unedited version of the talk about Contexture, a toolset for building highly interactive data exploration (aka search) interfaces at the 2018 South Florida Code Camp.

name: Contexture Talk (screen)
description: This is a raw, unedited version of the talk about Contexture. This version only shows the screencast.
